org.dice_research.squirrel.frontier.impl

Class WorkerGuard

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dice_research.squirrel.frontier.impl.WorkerGuard

  • public class WorkerGuard
extends Object
    This class checks whether some Worker has died and propagates the information to the FrontierComponent.
    Author:
    Philip Frerk

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static org.slf4j.Logger LOGGER 
      private Map<String,org.dice_research.squirrel.worker.WorkerInfo> mapWorkerInfo
      A map from Worker id to WorkerInfo containing information about the Worker.
      private int numberOfDeadWorkers
      Counting the number of workers that already died.
      static long TIME_WORKER_DEAD
      After this period of time (in seconds), a worker is considered to be dead if he has not sent an AliveMessage since.
      private Timer timer
      The timer to check for dead or alive workers.
